name: Planet X remastered
description:
"It all started almost six months ago when I decided to go on the damn adventure of life. As life on earth has already been a torment for the past decades, I decided to enlist. On a flyer lying among a ton of unpaid bills, everything looked beautiful. Beautiful women, good beer, and the glory of a hero. Only know that you will soon after find out that the only pleasure you experience here is a moment of peace. NESP hires you, and with a gun in your hand, you make your way through the devilishly dangerous space. If only life could look like it does on the flyer… But it doesn’t, and I’m stuck with a contract for a heap of time."

!!!Play on Fullscreen!!!

!!English version doesn't include english dubbing but is subtitles!!
